title: Reliance Home Finance headed for voluntary liquidation, surrenders CoR
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has granted approval for Reliance Home Finance's voluntary exit from the home finance business. Authum Investment and Infrastructure Ltd, which acquired Reliance Home Finance a year ago, has proposed the voluntary liquidation. The housing finance company plans to execute a slump sale of all assets to Reliance Commercial Finance Ltd, another company acquired by Authum Investment.
